column4: hi, just installedubuntu, im a new linux user so dont know much, i downloaded xmms to play my mp3's, which i can see via my windows network, but when i try to ./configure, it says i have no c compiler
'apt-get install build-essential'
but why are you compiling xmms?
type 'apt-get install xmms-mad' ... make sure universe is enabled though...
installing xmms-mad will also install xmms... but give you mp3 support right away
instead of installing xmms first, then xmms-mad when you figure out you need it  ;)
you know how to enable universe?
it is where xmms-mad is...
just find the 'deb' line that lists universe at the end
gah... in /etc/apt/sources.list... but maybe you shouldn't be editing that yourself...
in System > Administration > Synaptic Package Manager ... go to Settings > Repository and look for the first listing for 'universe'... make sure it is on
im the package mananger and i go to setting srepositories and then i see no universe thing?!
they should Just Work (tm)  ... only way to find out is to try though  ;)
